name: Super pingu 2
description:
Super pingu part 2 finally released!
A fun and simple game for any age to play.
Super pingu is back again with some really good treats to show, play the magical world of super pingu,
finish the spectacular levels, defeat the enemies and collect goodies, diamonds and stars along your way.

Jump, slide, throw and shoot pingu from a canon and if that was not enough, there are tons of awesome stunts along the way to try out, like the jetpack for example!

Enter the world of the super pingu part 2 and be amazed!
